edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.network.configuration

Class NetworkConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.network.configuration.NetworkConfiguration

  • public class NetworkConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores configuration information for connecting to the core server API.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String apiUrl 
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> defaultRequestHeaders

      protected java.util.List<RequestObserver> observers
      The default request headers.
